titleStmt.title: A Discourse concerning a guide in matters of faith with respect especially to the Romish pretence of the necessity of such a one as is infallible.
titleStmt.author: Tenison, Thomas, 1636-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ben. Tooke ... and F. Gardiner ...,

notesStmt.note: Other eds. show author's name on t.p.
Running title: Of a guide in matters of faith.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
